item.description:
Senior Director of Data Science, AI, Big Data Technologies.

Natalino leads the definition, design and implementation of data-driven financial, telecom and retail applications. He has previously served as Enterprise Data Architect at ING in the Netherlands, focusing on fraud prevention/detection, SoC, Cybersecurity, Customer Experience, and core banking processes, E-Retail Marketing Automation, Data Pipelines for Marketing and Financial Reporting (both traditional ETL and AI-enhanced) ​

​Prior to that, he had worked as senior researcher at Philips Research Laboratories in the Netherlands, on the topics of system-on-a-chip architectures, distributed computing and compilers. All-round Technology Manager, Product Developer, and Innovator with 15+ years track record in research, development and management of distributed architectures, scalable services and data-driven applications.”
